name: Foodies Malaysia
description: As you know, Malaysia is one of the most beautiful tropical country in the world, although many would prefer other countries such as Thailand, Singapore. But what you don't know is, there are many tourist attraction/foods/delicacies especially those hidden one awaiting you to try out!!! Please provide me a chance to plan a memorable trip in Malaysia. Belum try belum tau, sekali try hari-hari mau (Means that once you try, you will never say no!)
